File /std/basic/auto_load.c

This file has generic methods of accessing auto load information. This will save memory and generaly be more useful than the previous version. It shoudl also solve a lot of the container in container problems,

Written by Pinkfish

Started Wed Feb 17 13:46:35 PST 1999

Method index

add_auto_load_value(mapping, string, string, mixed)
This method adds a value into the auto load mapping.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
add_auto_load_value
mapping add_auto_load_value(mapping map,
string file_name,
string tag,
mixed value)
This method adds a value into the auto load mapping.

Parameters:
map - the mapping to add to
file_name - the file name tag of the object doing the adding
tag - the tag name to be used
value - the value to be stored with it.
Example: 
#define AUTO_LOAD_TAG "object"

mapping query_dynamic_auto_load() {
   mapping map;

   map = ::query_dynamic_auto_load();
   map = add_auto_load_value(map, AUTO_LOAD_TAG, "name", name);
} /* query_dynamic_auto_load() */
query_auto_load_value
mixed query_auto_load_value(mapping map,
string file_name,
string tag)
This method will attempt to read the tag value for the given name out of the auto load mapping.

This works backwards compatible with the old method of dealing with tags and file names.

Parameters:
map - the auto load mapping
file_name - the file name tag to use
tag - the tag to use in the file name
Example: 
#define AUTO_LOAD_TAG "object"

mapping init_dynamic_arg(mapping map) {
   mapping map;

   map = ::query_dynamic_auto_load();
   map = add_auto_load_value(map, AUTO_LOAD_TAG, "name", name);
} /* init_dynamic_arg() */
